limit.title: Maximum number of products to scrape
limit.description: Maximum number of products to scrape (default: 12, max: 1000)

offset.title: Starting offset for pagination
offset.description: Number of products to skip from the beginning (default: 0)

days.title: Time period in days
days.description: Number of days to look back for trending products (default: 1)

region.title: Geographic region
region.description: Region to scrape products from (default: uk)

shopId.title: Specific shop ID (optional)
shopId.description: Filter products by specific shop ID (optional)

maxRetries.title: Maximum retry attempts
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests (default: 3)

delayBetweenRequests.title: Delay between requests (ms)
delayBetweenRequests.description: Delay in milliseconds between API requests (default: 1000)
